subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: Make sure you have the forge Maven2 repository reference and dependency definition in the root pom.xml of your project.

div.source:
<repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<repository> <id>hippo-maven2-forge</id> <name>Hippo Maven 2 Forge Repository</name> <url>http://maven.onehippo.com/maven2-forge/</url> </repository>
<!-- SNIP -->
</repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.exdocpickerbase.version' to a version of this plugin! --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.exdocpickerbase</groupId> <artifactId>exdocpickerbase-openui-field</artifactId> <version>${forge.exdocpickerbase.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: Add the following dependency in either cms-dependencies/pom.xml in Hippo CMS v13+ or cms/pom.xml in the earlier versions.
Now, you're ready to use the plugin!
